main event: A housewife and two marines observed a white flickering object that appeared to be a balloon at the Brooklyn Navy Yard on 8 March 1955.
interesting points: The sighting was observed using both Ground-Radar and Air-Visual methods., The duration of the observation was approximately 5 minutes., The object displayed no directional motion., The object was described as white and flickering., There are no photographs associated with this sighting.
sighted object: white flickering object resembling a balloon
location: Brooklyn Navy Yard, New York, USA
